Example:
----------

**views.py**
::

    def some_action(request):
        ...
        request.flash['error'] = "You can't post comments in this section"
        return HttpReponseRedirect("/")


**base.html**
::

    {% if flash %}
        {% for message in flash.error %}
            {{ message }}
        {% endfor %}
    {% endif %}


Download:
----------
    hg clone http://bitbucket.org/offline/django-flashcookie/
